titleStmt.title: A rehearsall both straung and true, of hainous and horrible actes committed by Elizabeth Stile alias Rockingham, Mother Dutten, Mother Deuell, Mother Margaret, fower notorious witches, apprehended at Winsore in the countie of Barks. and at Abbington arraigned, condemned, and executed, on the 26 daye of Februarie laste Anno. 1579.

publicationStmt.publisher: [By J. Kingston] for Edward White at the little north-doore of Paules, at the signe of the Gun, and are there to be sold,

notesStmt.note: Printer's name and publication date from STC.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the little north-doore of Paules, at the signe of the Gun
